Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 74th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted WB: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Racine; EB: 74th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, and 74th, due to, street blockage, near 74th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 74th/Halsted, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Racine.

Eastbound buses will operate via: .74th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, and 74th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp.Temp Northbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
